comments:
I20050617-0010 (RC3)

Find/Install a new Plugin dialog
Install the update found at the site : http://eclipseexeditor.sourceforge.net/updates/
Choose to add to a new extension location
When it warns you that you should restart, agree
You will get an error dialog whos OK button will not work
Close via the red window button
Eclipse hangs - you need to Force Quit the app.  When you restart your settings will be futzed.  Your 
perspective list will be reset at the very least.

The following stack is in the log along with others of a similar nature - disposed images:

Kim, there is nothing special about Update here. What I can see in the 
exception log is that the workbench window chokes on the attempt to close 
(looks to me that CLabel is involved - probably the one in the status line). 
All Update did was ask the workbench to restart.

Hrm.  This appears to be an artifact of my workspace.  Trying on another machine and in a clean 
workspace on my own cannot reproduce this...
I could not reproduce on a windows machine.
Reducing severity based on the discussion.
Kim, does this still happen to you, or we can close it?
I haven't seen this in a dogs age.
